description: Try this delicious, creamy chicken dish. The recipe takes tasty chicken thighs and marries them with a garlicky carbonara-like sauce.
keywords: Skillet Chicken With Creamy Garlic Sauce
name: Skillet Chicken With Creamy Garlic Sauce Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: blanched green beans, baby rocket leaves and lemon wedges
500 g free range chicken thigh fillets

recipeInstructions.text: Divide chicken and sauce among plates. Top with extra parsley and serve with green beans, rocket leaves and lemon wedges.
